TEXT.TITLE: DOW CHEMICAL <DOW> RAISING LATEX ADDITIVE PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Dow Chemical Co said effective July 15 it is raising all bulk and drum prices for its line of DOWNRIGHT styrene-butadiene latex additives used in the modification of asphalts by 15 pct. Reuter
